name: Bird Project
description: In 2013 I was fed up with college, I couldn't study for the life of me and all I wanted to do was immerse myself in videogame making. Instead of uselessly trying harder on my grades, I started making my ideal flying game. I would work non-stop until I fell asleep at 4AM in front of my computer and as soon as I woke up I would keep working on it. I didn't make anything great but I did learn quite a lot. I recently found some of the oldest builds of this game project and I'm archiving them all here so I don't lose them in the freak accident that's bound to happen to me at any time.
